string.text:
A worn leather wallet for banknotes.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for currency

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety and managing reasons. But many stalkers keep at least a few roubles in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes. This makes life easier and conserves battery life.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
